price: Indeed, We had given Abraham sound judgment before[22], for We know him well.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: [22] i.e., before Moses, or in his early youth.
